title: You won't believe you are still this close to downtown!
posting_body: ['Text 5382A   to my cell for more info!', 'Are you ready to make your move into a new home?', ' I’d like to help!', ' As a native Austinite, with 10 years of experience in the rental housing market, I know how to help you in the most efficient and productive way.', ' I have access to thousands of apartments, condos and houses, including the private market.', 'I will not send you random properties, that may or may not be a good fit and that may or may not have anything available.', ' I will send you direct links to the actual property, with up-to-date availability, pricing and floor plans.', ' Once you decide on the properties that are a good fit for you, I will map out a plan and schedule tours, on your behalf, for each individual property.', 'Let me do the work and all you have to do is point and click and show up for the appointment.', 'How do I get paid for my services, you may ask?', ' I get paid by the management company that you choose to lease from.', ' My services are free to you!', ' All that is needed is that you write my name down, on the application, as the referring agent that help you.', 'Disclaimer:  I do not service short term housing.', ' You will have to call the property directly to ask for corporate housing or short-term rental options.', 'Must have excellent rental history, no criminal background record and valid bank records or an offer letter to validate income of three times the rent.', ' Credit scores don’t need to be perfect, as long as you don’t owe any properties money.', 'I look forward to helping you make your home search an easy success!', 'Welcome to your brand-new home!', "Here, you'll discover what it's like to live surrounded by nature, with the most luxurious amenities at your fingertips.", 'Our apartments with yards in South Austin come in one, two, and three-bedroom designs, each of them outfitted with the latest features and finishes.', "Pair this with a highly accessible location near Downtown, and you'll never want to leave.", 'Pets allowed.', "One look and you'll see what we mean.", 'Our community is highlighted by resort-inspired outdoor spaces that make any sunny day extra bright.', 'These include multi-level swimming pools with fountains and waterfalls, a private 5-acre park with extensive walking trails, communal grilling stations for special events, as well as three dog parks for your furry companions.', "If you'd rather spend time inside with friends, the modern clubhouse with WiFi is just perfect for the occasion.", "There's also an elite fitness center open 24 hours so that you can make the most of it even on your busiest days.", 'When it comes to our South Austin apartments with yards, they are equally impressive.', 'Each of them is outfitted with GE clean steel electric appliances, air conditioning, garden-style tubs, walk-in closets, full-size washer/dryer connections, and more.']
